TopicTitle: RealChute parachutes system Mod in ITALIAN

Articles.Content:
Dear all,

 

I would like to submit this issue after my KSP automatically upgraded in ITALIAN via STEAM.

I was using RealChute parachutes system Mod and after language upgrade in Italian all the parachutes parts in VAB/SPH disappeared.

Please let me know if I can do something

WIN10

CKAN 1.25.3

KSP 1.5.1.2335 ITA

[MOD - Moved to Technical Support (PC, modded installs) subforums]

  • Try verifying the integrity of your Steam copy of KSP
  • Check to see if the parachute parts reappear if you change the language to English
  • Check to see if the parachute parts reappear after you remove RealChutes and change the language back to Italian

Integrity is ok, all the parts reappear after removed RealChutes but I am unable to change language to/from English...... version is only in italian.

I found now a solution, parts are present if you enable ADVANCED PART view!
even if I can see parts in advanced mode it is not possible to edit. There are no group visible on left screen on VAB so I cannot choose to edit Real Chute preferences. Please let me know.
